images.caption: Figure 1:Lean formulation for Localized Empirical Process Framework. It includes thebluepart for the capacity control and theredpart for concentration. The colored zone indicates the major results in the chapters ofWainwright (2019)(High Dimensional Statistics, HDS) andBoucheronet al.(2013)(Concentration Inequality, CI).
Figure 2:The dependency graph of our formalizations. All the contents in the graph have not been implemented in Lean 4 before.
